summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Samastu fitness app. Backend APIs working perfectly (11/11 tests passed). Frontend flows mostly working with one workflow timing issue in workout completion.

integration_issues.issue: After completing first exercise and rest timer, next exercise button doesn't appear consistently
integration_issues.details: The workout flow logic in WorkoutPage.js uses setTimeout to move to next exercise after rest, but the timing may not be synchronized properly with the UI state updates

passed_tests: User registration flow with email/password validation
User login flow with existing credentials
Onboarding flow: gender, height/weight, goal, equipment selection
Home page: displays workout journey path with proper node states
Home page: displays user stats (Level, XP, Streak) correctly
Workout execution: click on workout node and load exercise details
Workout execution: complete first exercise with rest timer
Profile page: displays user stats and achievements
Profile page: edit profile functionality working
Backend API: All 11 endpoints working (auth, workouts, progress, achievements)
XP calculation: 50 XP per workout correctly calculated
Streak calculation: increments correctly on workout completion
Achievement system: proper achievement definitions and tracking
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix workout completion flow timing issue: The setTimeout logic in WorkoutPage.js handleCompleteExercise function may not be properly synchronized with React state updates. Consider using useEffect to handle exercise transitions instead of setTimeout.
